Name: Central District
Description: The largest district in Botswana, it is known for its varied landscape, including vast deserts, and is central to the country s agricultural activities.

Name: Ghanzi District
Description: Located in the western part of Botswana, Ghanzi is known for its arid landscape and is important for livestock farming.

Name: Kgalagadi District
Description: Located in the southwestern region, Kgalagadi is known for its desert landscapes and the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park, a popular wildlife reserve.

Name: Kweneng District
Description: Located to the south of Botswana, Kweneng is a largely agricultural region, with significant production of cattle and crops.

Name: North East District
Description: This district is located in the northeastern part of Botswana, known for its rich wildlife and tourism opportunities.

Name: North West District
Description: Located in the northwest, this district includes parts of the Okavango Delta, one of the world s largest inland deltas, and a UNESCO World Heritage site.

Name: South East District
Description: The South East District includes the capital city, Gaborone, and is the country s economic and political center.

Name: Southern District
Description: Located in the southern part of the country, this district has a strong focus on agriculture, especially livestock farming.
